page.title: 13Focus on two restaurants.2
page.content: (continued from page 12) Both Cassinelli's and The Beeches catered for weddings and other celebrations, including children's parties, but Cassinelli's provided more entertainment, with 3 discoteques per week, disc jockeys, comedians and cabaret artists as well as piped music. Most of their bookings were from family groups or young people, whereas The Beeches expected a large proportion of businessmen amongst their clients. At Cassinelli's the most popular dishes were steak and pizza - the theme of the restaurant and its menu are Italian - but the most popular dish at The Beeches was fish.
